mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, PASSWORD, NAME, USER_NO, EMAIL FROM USERTABLE WHERE USER_ID=#{user_id} AND PASSWORD=#{password}
SELECT USER_ID, NAME FROM USERTABLE WHERE USER_IN = 'true'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERTABLE ( USER_NO, USER_ID, NAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL ) VALUES ( USER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{user_id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{email} )
mapper.update: UPDATE USERTABLE SET USER_IN = "'true'" WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no}
UPDATE USERTABLE SET USER_IN = "'false'" WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no}
